summary: This document is a detailed timeline of events at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York surrounding the death of inmate Jeffrey Epstein on August 10, 2019. It chronicles his activities the day before, the discovery of his body, medical response, notifications to authorities, and subsequent investigative actions by the FBI and OIG.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The inmate who was found unresponsive in his cell on August 10, 2019, and later pronounced dead. He had attorney visits the day before.

persons.name: Efrain Reyes
persons.context: Epstein's cellmate who departed for court on the morning of August 9, 2019.

persons.name: Judge Berman
persons.context: The judge was notified of Epstein's death at 10:00 am on August 10, 2019, and later provided with a press release.

persons.name: Kerwin John
persons.context: An OIG agent who arrived at the institution on August 11, 2019, and departed with computer hard drives from the SHU.

persons.name: Guido Modano
persons.context: An OIG agent who arrived at the institution with Agent Kerwin John on August 11, 2019, and departed later that day.

persons.name: C. Edge
persons.context: Arrived at the institution at 9:00 am on August 10, 2019, following the incident.

connections.description: Reyes was Epstein's cellmate in the Special Housing Unit (SHU) at MCC New York.
Both were OIG agents who arrived together at the institution on August 11, 2019, to investigate the incident.

events.title: Epstein's Last Full Day
events.description: Epstein spends the day in attorney conferences and is reported to be in good spirits during a social call in the evening.

events.title: Discovery of Epstein Unresponsive
events.description: At 6:33 am, staff find inmate Jeffrey Epstein unresponsive in his cell. CPR is initiated, EMS is called, and he is transported to Beekman Hospital.

events.title: Epstein Pronounced Dead
events.description: At 7:36 am, the ER physician reports the official time of death for Jeffrey Epstein.

events.title: FBI and OIG Notified and Arrive
events.description: The FBI is notified at 8:34 am and arrives later in the day. The OIG is notified and sends agents who arrive in the afternoon.

events.title: Evidence Collection by OIG
events.description: OIG Agents Kerwin John and Guido Modano arrive and remove computer hard drives from the Special Housing Unit (SHU).

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein was found unresponsive in his cell at the MCC New York SHU at 6:33 am on Saturday, August 10, 2019.
Epstein had been visited by several attorneys throughout the day on Friday, August 9, and was reported to be in 'good spirits' during a social call at 7:00 pm that evening.
His official time of death was reported by an ER physician at 7:36 am on August 10, after efforts to resuscitate him failed.
OIG agents seized computer hard drives from the SHU on August 11, 2019, as part of the investigation into the incident.
The timeline shows multiple notifications to and arrivals of law enforcement and oversight bodies, including the FBI, OIG, USMS, and the judge overseeing his case.
